        <form id="{%widget.id%}_form" action="{%website.root_url%}{%widget.action%}" name="{%widget.id%}_name" method="POST">
                <input name="widget_id" value="{%widget.id%}" type="hidden"/>
                <input name="path_configuration" value="{%widget.data.configurationDataProvider%}" type="hidden"/>
                <input name="path_structure" value="{%widget.data.itemsDataProvider%}" type="hidden"/>
                <input name="mail_from" value="" type="hidden"/>
                <fieldset>
                    {%content%}
                </fieldset>
            </form>
<input id="{%widget.id%}_{%item.type%}" type="submit" class="mjs-item mjs-button" style="{%item.style%};" value="{%label%}"/>
<input id="{%widget.id%}_{%item.type%}" type="reset" class="mjs-item mjs-button" style="{%item.style%}" value="{%label%}"/>
